_acceptAdmin().details: Admin function for pending admin to accept role and update admin
_acceptAdmin().return: uint Returns 0 on success, otherwise returns a failure code (see ErrorReporter.sol for details).

params.addAmount: The amount of underlying tokens to add as reserves

_addReserves(uint256).return: uint Returns 0 on success, otherwise returns a failure code (see ErrorReporter.sol for details).

params.data: The encoded bytes data for any initialization

_reduceReserves(uint256).return: uint Returns 0 on success, otherwise returns a failure code (see ErrorReporter.sol for details).

_setComptroller(address).details: Admin function to set a new comptroller
_setComptroller(address).return: uint Returns 0 on success, otherwise returns a failure code (see ErrorReporter.sol for details).

_setInterestRateModel(address).details: Governance function to accrue interest and update the interest rate model

params.newInterestRateModel_: The new interest rate model to use

_setInterestRateModel(address).return: uint Returns 0 on success, otherwise returns a failure code (see ErrorReporter.sol for details).

_setPendingAdmin(address).details: Admin function to begin change of admin. The newPendingAdmin must call `_acceptAdmin` to finalize the transfer.
_setPendingAdmin(address).return: uint Returns 0 on success, otherwise returns a failure code (see ErrorReporter.sol for details).

_setReserveFactor(uint256).details: Governor function to accrue interest and set a new reserve factor
_setReserveFactor(uint256).return: uint Returns 0 on success, otherwise returns a failure code (see ErrorReporter.sol for details).

accrueInterest().details: This calculates interest accrued from the last checkpointed block up to the current block and writes new checkpoint to storage and reduce spread reserves to protocol share reserve if currentBlock - reduceReservesBlockNumber >= blockDelta

params.owner: The address of the account which owns the tokens to be spent
params.spender: The address of the account which may transfer tokens

allowance(address,address).return: The number of tokens allowed to be spent (-1 means infinite)

approve(address,uint256).details: This will overwrite the approval amount for `spender` and is subject to issues noted [here](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-20#approve)

params.amount: The number of tokens that are approved (-1 means infinite)
params.spender: The address of the account which may transfer tokens

approve(address,uint256).return: Whether or not the approval succeeded

params.owner: The address of the account to query

balanceOf(address).return: The number of tokens owned by `owner`

balanceOfUnderlying(address).details: This also accrues interest in a transaction

params.owner: The address of the account to query

balanceOfUnderlying(address).return: The amount of underlying owned by `owner`

params.borrowAmount: The amount of the underlying asset to borrow

borrow(uint256).return: uint Returns 0 on success, otherwise returns a failure code (see ErrorReporter.sol for details).

params.account: The address whose balance should be calculated after updating borrowIndex
The address whose balance should be calculated

params.borrowAmount: The amount of the underlying asset to borrow
params.borrower: The borrower, on behalf of whom to borrow.

borrowBehalf(address,uint256).return: uint Returns 0 on success, otherwise returns a failure code (see ErrorReporter.sol for details).

borrowRatePerBlock().return: The borrow interest rate per block, scaled by 1e18

exchangeRateStored().details: This function does not accrue interest before calculating the exchange rate

getAccountSnapshot(address).details: This is used by comptroller to more efficiently perform liquidity checks.

params.account: Address of the account to snapshot

getAccountSnapshot(address).return: (possible error, token balance, borrow balance, exchange rate mantissa)

getCash().return: The quantity of underlying asset owned by this contract

params.decimals_: BEP-20 decimal precision of this token
params.initialExchangeRateMantissa_: The initial exchange rate, scaled by 1e18
params.interestRateModel_: The address of the interest rate model
params.underlying_: The address of the underlying asset

params.decimals_: EIP-20 decimal precision of this token
params.initialExchangeRateMantissa_: The initial exchange rate, scaled by 1e18
params.interestRateModel_: The address of the interest rate model

params.borrower: The borrower of this vToken to be liquidated
params.repayAmount: The amount of the underlying borrowed asset to repay
params.vTokenCollateral: The market in which to seize collateral from the borrower

liquidateBorrow(address,uint256,address).return: uint Returns 0 on success, otherwise returns a failure code (see ErrorReporter.sol for details).

mint(uint256).details: Accrues interest whether or not the operation succeeds, unless reverted

params.mintAmount: The amount of the underlying asset to supply

mint(uint256).return: uint Returns 0 on success, otherwise returns a failure code (see ErrorReporter.sol for details).

mintBehalf(address,uint256).details: Accrues interest whether or not the operation succeeds, unless reverted

params.mintAmount: The amount of the underlying asset to supply
params.receiver: The account which is receiving the vTokens

mintBehalf(address,uint256).return: uint Returns 0 on success, otherwise returns a failure code (see ErrorReporter.sol for details).

redeem(uint256).details: Accrues interest whether or not the operation succeeds, unless reverted

params.redeemTokens: The number of vTokens to redeem into underlying

redeem(uint256).return: uint Returns 0 on success, otherwise returns a failure code (see ErrorReporter.sol for details).

redeemBehalf(address,uint256).details: Accrues interest whether or not the operation succeeds, unless reverted

params.redeemTokens: The number of vTokens to redeem into underlying
params.redeemer: The user on behalf of whom to redeem

redeemBehalf(address,uint256).return: uint Returns 0 on success, otherwise returns a failure code (see ErrorReporter.sol for details).

redeemUnderlying(uint256).details: Accrues interest whether or not the operation succeeds, unless reverted

params.redeemAmount: The amount of underlying to redeem

redeemUnderlying(uint256).return: uint Returns 0 on success, otherwise returns a failure code (see ErrorReporter.sol for details).

redeemUnderlyingBehalf(address,uint256).details: Accrues interest whether or not the operation succeeds, unless reverted

params.redeemAmount: The amount of underlying to receive from redeeming vTokens
params.redeemer: , on behalf of whom to redeem

redeemUnderlyingBehalf(address,uint256).return: uint Returns 0 on success, otherwise returns a failure code (see ErrorReporter.sol for details).

params.borrower: The account with the debt being payed off

seize(address,address,uint256).details: Will fail unless called by another vToken during the process of liquidation. Its absolutely critical to use msg.sender as the borrowed vToken and not a parameter.

params.seizeTokens: The number of vTokens to seize

seize(address,address,uint256).return: uint Returns 0 on success, otherwise returns a failure code (see ErrorReporter.sol for details).

setAccessControlManager(address).details: Admin function to set the access control address

params.newAccessControlManagerAddress: New address for the access control

params.protcolShareReserve_: The address of protocol share reserve contract

supplyRatePerBlock().return: The supply interest rate per block, scaled by 1e18

params.amount: The number of tokens to transfer
params.dst: The address of the destination account

transfer(address,uint256).return: Whether or not the transfer succeeded

params.amount: The number of tokens to transfer
params.dst: The address of the destination account
params.src: The address of the source account

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).return: Whether or not the transfer succeeded

_acceptAdmin().notice: Accepts transfer of admin rights. msg.sender must be pendingAdmin

_becomeImplementation(bytes).notice: Called by the delegator on a delegate to initialize it for duty

_reduceReserves(uint256).notice: Accrues interest and reduces reserves by transferring to protocol share reserve

_resignImplementation().notice: Called by the delegator on a delegate to forfeit its responsibility

_setComptroller(address).notice: Sets a new comptroller for the market

_setInterestRateModel(address).notice: Accrues interest and updates the interest rate model using _setInterestRateModelFresh

_setPendingAdmin(address).notice: Begins transfer of admin rights. The newPendingAdmin must call `_acceptAdmin` to finalize the transfer.

_setReserveFactor(uint256).notice: accrues interest and sets a new reserve factor for the protocol using `_setReserveFactorFresh`

accrueInterest().notice: Applies accrued interest to total borrows and reserves

allowance(address,address).notice: Get the current allowance from `owner` for `spender`

approve(address,uint256).notice: Approve `spender` to transfer up to `amount` from `src`

balanceOf(address).notice: Get the token balance of the `owner`

balanceOfUnderlying(address).notice: Get the underlying balance of the `owner`

borrow(uint256).notice: Sender borrows assets from the protocol to their own address

borrowBalanceCurrent(address).notice: Accrue interest to updated borrowIndex and then calculate account's borrow balance using the updated borrowIndex

borrowBalanceStored(address).notice: Return the borrow balance of account based on stored data

borrowBehalf(address,uint256).notice: Sender borrows assets on behalf of some other address. This function is only available  for senders, explicitly marked as delegates of the borrower using `comptroller.updateDelegate`

borrowRatePerBlock().notice: Returns the current per-block borrow interest rate for this vToken

exchangeRateCurrent().notice: Accrue interest then return the up-to-date exchange rate

exchangeRateStored().notice: Calculates the exchange rate from the underlying to the VToken

getAccountSnapshot(address).notice: Get a snapshot of the account's balances, and the cached exchange rate

getCash().notice: Get cash balance of this vToken in the underlying asset

liquidateBorrow(address,uint256,address).notice: The sender liquidates the borrowers collateral. The collateral seized is transferred to the liquidator.

mint(uint256).notice: Sender supplies assets into the market and receives vTokens in exchange

mintBehalf(address,uint256).notice: Sender supplies assets into the market and receiver receives vTokens in exchange

redeem(uint256).notice: Sender redeems vTokens in exchange for the underlying asset

redeemBehalf(address,uint256).notice: Sender redeems assets on behalf of some other address. This function is only available  for senders, explicitly marked as delegates of the supplier using `comptroller.updateDelegate`

redeemUnderlying(uint256).notice: Sender redeems vTokens in exchange for a specified amount of underlying asset

redeemUnderlyingBehalf(address,uint256).notice: Sender redeems underlying assets on behalf of some other address. This function is only available  for senders, explicitly marked as delegates of the supplier using `comptroller.updateDelegate`

repayBorrowBehalf(address,uint256).notice: Sender repays a borrow belonging to another borrowing account

seize(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfers collateral tokens (this market) to the liquidator.

setAccessControlManager(address).notice: Sets the address of the access control manager of this contract

setProtocolShareReserve(address).notice: Sets protocol share reserve contract address

setReduceReservesBlockDelta(uint256).notice: Governance function to set new threshold of block difference after which funds will be sent to the protocol share reserve

supplyRatePerBlock().notice: Returns the current per-block supply interest rate for this vToken

totalBorrowsCurrent().notice: Returns the current total borrows plus accrued interest

userdoc.notice: VTokens which wrap an EIP-20 underlying and are delegated to
